title: Eurostile Alternatives...
content: I'm looking for alternatives to Eurostile. Any suggestions?
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
maybe some of the more extpanded styles of [Zeppelin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/www.stormtype.com/zepp.html)

maybe [Amplitude](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Amplitude/styles) or [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/TitlingGothicFB).
Some solid suggestions. I'm still open to more.

Kyle, do you need a typeface for text or display?

How about Storm's [Elektra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/www.stormtype.com/elektra.html)?

[Stratum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum1/)?

FF Hydra text is very nice.  
Like Eurostile but less tired and more distinct.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/hydra-text/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/hydra-text/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/hydra-text/regular/")

Just saw this one this morning...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/myers-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218182757/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/myers-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/myers-sans/")

Thanks, Gents.

Some great suggestions here. Much appreciated.
so what didja choose? enquiring minds want to know!
the jury will be out for a little while on this one. I will let you know. ;)
